transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
At the start of battle, grants Ariel for 1 turn
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage

transcend.6:

SKT_FIRST.name: Swift Strike
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to reduce skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Gale of Sword Princess</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Resets Gale of Sword Princess cooldown

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nIncreases damage\nExtra turn

description: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000096_1_1]</color> chance to reduce skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Gale of Sword Princess</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000096_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Tempest
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) Attack and Critical Hit Chance increase proportional to missing Health. (Max <color=#28d9ed>50%</color>)\nIncreases damage dealt to Bosses by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.
description: (Passive Effect) Attack and Critical Hit Chance increase proportional to missing Health. (Max <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000096_2_1]</color>)\nIncreases damage dealt to Bosses by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000096_2_3]</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Gale of Sword Princess
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc:
Attacks an enemy, and grants <color=#28d9ed>Ariel</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
Before attacking, when already granted <color=#28d9ed>Ariel</color>, activates <color=#28d9ed>Lil Rafaga</color> instead.

<color=#ffd732>Lil Rafaga</color>: Attacks all enemies. Ignores <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense.
description:
Attacks an enemy, and grants <color=#28d9ed>Ariel</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000096_3_1] turn(s)</color>.
Before attacking, when already granted <color=#28d9ed>Ariel</color>, activates <color=#28d9ed>Lil Rafaga</color> instead.

<color=#ffd732>Lil Rafaga</color>: Attacks all enemies. Ignores <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Increases Critical Damage of the attack by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Gale of Sword Princess</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Increases Critical Damage of the attack by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Gale of Sword Princess</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000096_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.
